Distribution. This subspecies is limited to the areas adjacent to Adriatic and Ionian Sea coasts of Italy , Slovenia , Croatia , and Greece (Corfu) (
Faraci & Rizzotti Vlach 1992
,
Linskog 1995
,
Protić 2009
,
Aukema et al. 2013
).
New species record for Montenegro .
